pullRequest.title: Fixed issue with the unzipping the nested directories.
pullRequest.bodyText:
The issue is related to the ZIP entries are not being correctly created for the directories which doesn't include a trailing slash so it leads to ZipEntry.isDirectory() calls to always return false.
Checklist

 Tags Set
 Milestone Set
 Any breaking changes are documented
 New public APIs have @Nonnull/@Nullable annotations
 New public APIs have @since tags in Javadoc
 For code samples, code sample main readme is updated

Links to issues fixed (if any):
Fixes #1845

commit.message: Fixed issue with the unzipping the nested directories. The issue is related to the ZIP entries are not being correctly created for the directories which doesn't include a trailing slash so it leads to ZipEntry.isDirectory() calls to always return false.

nodes.bodyText: IIUIC, git also doesn't store empty directories. If you had an empty directory in /nested, they aren't there when you check out from git.
